TEXT.English: The most dangerous disharmonies often come in the form of the softest targets [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A demonic general, hiding safely behind his infernal horde [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Or an angelic preacher, leading sermons from behind city walls [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Neither belong in creation. Both must be removed. The compact will be enforced.
TEXT.French: The most dangerous disharmonies often come in the form of the softest targets [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A demonic general, hiding safely behind his infernal horde [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Or an angelic preacher, leading sermons from behind city walls [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Neither belong in creation. Both must be removed. The compact will be enforced.

Both must be removed. The compact will be enforced.

TEXT.English: De Lu Yi, disciples of the compact and nature's majesty. A De Lu Yi's domain is immaculate, every living thing in its own proper place in creation, no one species dominating the other. No being, be it heavenly or hellspawn, would dare disturb even a single pebble.
TEXT.French: De Lu Yi, disciples of the compact and nature's majesty. A De Lu Yi's domain is immaculate, every living thing in its own proper place in creation, no one species dominating the other. No being, be it heavenly or hellspawn, would dare disturb even a single pebble.

TEXT.Italian: De Lu Yi, disciples of the compact and nature's majesty. A De Lu Yi's domain is immaculate, every living thing in its own proper place in creation, no one species dominating the other. No being, be it heavenly or hellspawn, would dare disturb even a single pebble.
TEXT.Spanish: De Lu Yi, disciples of the compact and nature's majesty. A De Lu Yi's domain is immaculate, every living thing in its own proper place in creation, no one species dominating the other. No being, be it heavenly or hellspawn, would dare disturb even a single pebble.

TEXT.English: No meddling force will enter the realms protected by these wardens; it simply will not happen. Not today, not this cycle, not even in this lifetime. The defilers of the compact will be held at spear point from the home we have built here! [NEWLINE] - Captain Xinlei of the Wardens on the day of the Lanun-Infernal invasion of Lohai
TEXT.French: No meddling force will enter the realms protected by these wardens; it simply will not happen. Not today, not this cycle, not even in this lifetime. The defilers of the compact will be held at spear point from the home we have built here! [NEWLINE] - Captain Xinlei of the Wardens on the day of the Lanun-Infernal invasion of Lohai

TEXT.English: Although weak for a rank 3 summon, an Air Elemental can pass over any terrain, including water tiles, and it can see 2 tiles further than other units. Upon winning a combat, Air Elementals have 25% chance to summon [LINK=UNIT_AIR_ELEMENTAL_MINOR]Minor Air Elementals[/LINK].
TEXT.French: Although weak for a rank 3 summon, an Air Elemental can pass over any terrain, including water tiles, and it can see 2 tiles further than other units. Upon winning a combat, Air Elementals have 25% chance to summon [LINK=UNIT_AIR_ELEMENTAL_MINOR]Minor Air Elementals[/LINK].
TEXT.German: Obwohl schwach für eine Level 3 Beschwörung, kann sich ein Luftelementar über jedes Gelände, inklusive Wasser, bewegen und 2 Felder weiter sehen als andere Einheiten. Wenn sie einen Kampf gewinnen, beschwören sie permanente Blitzelementare.
TEXT.Italian: Although weak for a rank 3 summon, an Air Elemental can pass over any terrain, including water tiles, and it can see 2 tiles further than other units. Upon winning a combat, Air Elementals have 25% chance to summon [LINK=UNIT_AIR_ELEMENTAL_MINOR]Minor Air Elementals[/LINK].
TEXT.Spanish: Although weak for a rank 3 summon, an Air Elemental can pass over any terrain, including water tiles, and it can see 2 tiles further than other units. Upon winning a combat, Air Elementals have 25% chance to summon [LINK=UNIT_AIR_ELEMENTAL_MINOR]Minor Air Elementals[/LINK].
